question: Crops loans up to what limit have been waived off by the Mahatma Jyotirao Phule Shetkari Karjmukti Yojana of Maharashtra government?
explanation: Under the Mahatma Jyotirao Phule Shetkari Karjmukti Yojana announced by the MVA government of Maharashtra, in December 2019, crop loans up to Rs 2 Lakh outstanding till September 30, 2019, will be waived off.
